'''''káno''''' is a [[Quenya]] noun for "commander", usually referring to a lesser rank, as one who would serve the highest chief.<ref name=PM>{{PM|Finwe}}, p. 345 (& note 36)</ref><ref>{{S|Appendix}}, entry ''káno''</ref> It could also mean "crier" or "herald".<ref name=PM/>

==Etymology==
*[[Sundocarme|Root]]: [[Common Eldarin]] [[KAN]]<ref name=PM/>

==Examples==
*[[Aracáno|''Ara'''káno''''']] = "High Chieftain"
*[[Fingon|''Finde'''káno''''']] = "Hair Commander"
*[[Kanafinwë|'''''Kana'''finwë'']] = "Strong-voiced Finwë"
*''[[Tercáno|ter'''cáno''']]'' = "herald"
*[[Turgon|''Turu'''káno''''']] = "Victory Commander"
